26g PROTEIN
Tips

PROTEIN POWDER IN OATMEAL

Learn how to add protein powder to oatmeal perfectly. 26g protein with no clumps guaranteed.

26g
Protein
340
Calories
8m
Total Time
1
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bowl

Carbs40g
Fat8g
Fiber5g
Sugar6g
DifficultyBeginner

INGREDIENTS

  • 80g rolled oats
  • 240ml milk
  • 30g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 5g cinnamon
  • 15g walnuts, chopped

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Cook Oats

Cook oats in milk over medium heat for 4 minutes.

2

Cool Down

Remove from heat and let sit for 2 minutes - this is crucial!

3

Add Protein

Slowly stir in protein powder, mixing continuously to prevent clumps.

4

Season

Add cinnamon and stir well.

5

Top

Sprinkle with walnuts and serve.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
